com.cubeia.firebase.poker.pokerbots.server.cache

Class CacheHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cubeia.firebase.poker.pokerbots.server.cache.CacheHandler

  • public class CacheHandler
extends Object
    Handles a tree cache. Singleton (one cache per JVM). This class provides the underpinnings for the CacheController.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Period (seconds) between cache updates
